comments.body: I'm not 100% sure on this one...seems like the intention could have been "exists", so I can update this PR if that is the intended meaning here.
@lpmi-13 thanks for the PR. This looks correct to me - `fail_json` will exit the code.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +371,375 @@                self.m.fail_json(msg="Fail to move /usr/sbin/policy-rc.d to %s" % self.backup_dir)

        # we write /usr/sbin/policy-rc.d so it always exits with code policy_rc_d
        try:
            with open('/usr/sbin/policy-rc.d', 'w') as policy_rc_d:
